# `to plist` for [formats](/commands/categories/formats.md)

<div class='command-title'>Convert Nu values into plist</div>

## Signature

```> to plist {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--binary, -b`: Output plist in binary format


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Convert a table into a plist file
```nu
> { a: 3 } | to plist

```
